articles.description: A judge said William Young was so obsessed with harassing the sheriff that he didn't realize his own father had died

articles.author: Democrat staff writer, Karl Etters, Democrat staff writer
articles.title: LetGo app used to lure robbery victims in Florida, Ohio, elsewhere
articles.description: LetGo app helps facilitate peer-to-peer sales of everyday items.
